per_second_data.visuals: Glitchy text 'RISING TENSIONS' and dark abstract shapes.

per_second_data.visuals: Blue underwater scene with floating debris and tech.
per_second_data.thought: Underwater? Why? Where's the gun? This is dragging. I'm about to scroll.

per_second_data.visuals: Large orange mech/robot in a blue room.
per_second_data.thought: Wait, a mech? Okay, that's actually kinda sick. Finally some action. Don't bore me now.

per_second_data.visuals: Close-up of a male character's face, looking serious.
per_second_data.thought: Who is this guy? He looks like he has a bad hair day. Hope he's not another generic protagonist.

per_second_data.visuals: Wide shot of a destroyed city street, character kneeling.
per_second_data.thought: LA in shambles. Typical CoD vibes. Graphics are actually clean though.

per_second_data.visuals: Face with black ink/liquid glitching effect over it.

per_second_data.visuals: Fast movement/shooting in a bright futuristic city.
per_second_data.thought: Okay, now we're talking. Movement looks smooth. Bet. This might be W.

per_second_data.visuals: End of the fast-paced action sequence.

per_second_data.visuals: Still just the black screen/looping logo. Nothing happening.

per_second_data.thought: Wait, 258 million dead? That's... actually kinda dark. Okay, maybe it's not total trash. But still, numbers on a map?

per_second_data.visuals: Huge cloud of black smoke rising, looks like an explosion aftermath.
per_second_data.thought: Oh, an explosion. Cool I guess. But where's the action? Just smoke? Boring.

per_second_data.visuals: Military tank/truck driving through a field.
per_second_data.thought: Tank rolling. Standard military stuff. Seen this a million times in Call of Duty. Nothing new here.

per_second_data.visuals: Tall building collapsing into dust and fire.
per_second_data.thought: Building crumbles. CGI is okay, but I've seen better destruction in Fortnite. Still, kinda epic.
